text: Have anyone seen the `ERROR: LoadError: Mutating arrays is not supported` when trying to differentiate a function with `Zygote.gradient()` function? I am trying to differentiate a `DerivativeOperator` from `DiffEqOperators`. (Stacktrace in comments)
